projects.title: Ethereal Couture Collection
projects.description: A high-fashion collection inspired by celestial movements and organic forms.

moodBoard.text: A palette of midnight blues and shimmering silvers evoking cosmic elegance.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by the phases of the moon and the fluidity of stardust.

projects.title: Urban Nomad Series
projects.description: Street-ready designs that blend comfort with cutting-edge aesthetics.

moodBoard.text: Graffiti textures, concrete tones, and modular silhouettes.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by city wanderers and the rhythm of urban life.

projects.title: Artisan Accessories
projects.description: Handcrafted accessories that complement contemporary fashion.

moodBoard.text: Earthy tones, raw textures, and artisanal craftsmanship.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by traditional leatherwork and modern minimalism.

projects.title: Neo-Traditional Fusion
projects.description: Modern interpretation of traditional Indian textiles and silhouettes.

moodBoard.text: Rich fabrics, heritage motifs, and bold contrasts.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by the fusion of old-world charm and new-age tailoring.

projects.title: Minimalist Streetwear
projects.description: Clean lines and understated elegance for everyday wear.

moodBoard.text: Neutral tones, relaxed fits, and subtle textures.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by Scandinavian design and urban simplicity.

projects.title: Statement Jewelry
projects.description: Bold jewelry pieces that make a statement.

moodBoard.text: Geometric shapes, metallic finishes, and dramatic silhouettes.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by architecture and expressive art forms.

projects.title: Evening Gown
projects.description: A glamorous evening gown featuring intricate embroidery and a timeless silhouette.

moodBoard.text: Velvet textures, gold accents, and candlelit elegance.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by vintage Hollywood and royal couture.

projects.title: Traditional Silk Saree
projects.description: A handwoven silk saree that celebrates traditional Indian craftsmanship.

moodBoard.text: Temple architecture, festive colors, and intricate weaves.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by South Indian heritage and ceremonial attire.

projects.title: Cocktail Dress
projects.description: An elegant cocktail dress for evening occasions with minimal yet bold design elements.

moodBoard.text: Monochrome palettes, sleek silhouettes, and ambient lighting.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by modern nightlife and minimalist glam.

projects.title: Casual Maxi Dress
projects.description: A flowing maxi dress for a relaxed yet chic daytime look.

moodBoard.text: Sunlight, breezy fabrics, and floral accents.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by summer strolls and effortless femininity.

projects.title: Festive Lehenga
projects.description: A vibrant lehenga crafted with intricate mirror work for festive occasions.

moodBoard.text: Fireworks, mirror reflections, and celebratory hues.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by Indian festivals and folk artistry.

projects.title: Boho Chic Tunic
projects.description: A stylish boho tunic blending artistic prints with a relaxed fit.

moodBoard.text: Tribal patterns, earthy tones, and free-spirited vibes.

projects.inspiration: Inspired by global nomads and artistic expression.

experience.title: Fashion Design Student
experience.description: Pursuing Bachelor's in Fashion Design with specialization in contemporary couture and sustainable fashion practices.

experience.title: President : Ethics and Social Service Club
experience.description: To make a positive impact through Community Engagement and volunteer opportunities.

experience.title: Designershala
experience.description: Interned with Designershala, built and managed their content, which led to great traffic and engagement. Also, drove their social media followers count to 25K by writing blogs, articles, reviews, and testimonials for aspiring design enthusiasts.

experience.title: Anushna by Nandini
experience.description: Worked with Anushna, a small business brand based in Kolkata. Worked as an Illustrator and Stylist-designed and developed prints, motifs, and moodboards for women's apparel. Tried hands-on semi-natural Shibori dyeing techniques & Block printing.
